health-female-kids-1.title: Handwash Heroine
health-female-kids-1.description: Learn proper handwashing techniques and when to wash your hands to stay healthy and clean!

health-female-kids-2.title: Cleanliness Quiz
health-female-kids-2.description: Answer 5 questions about daily hygiene habits. Bathing, brushing, and staying clean!

health-female-kids-3.title: Reflex Hygiene Check
health-female-kids-3.description: Quick! Tap for clean habits, avoid the dirty ones. Test your reflexes!

health-female-kids-4.title: Hygiene Match
health-female-kids-4.description: Match hygiene items to their uses. Learn what each item is for!
